full_summary:
======================================================
### Invitation to Tender for Generator Set Inspection and Maintenance Services

#### Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of Inspection and maintenance of generator sets services at the Institut Maurice-Lamontagne (IML) in Mont-Joli, Quebec.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4104795120-Doc4252355695
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-10
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2023-10-17T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-09-30

**Procurement**:
This is a competitive bidding process in accordance with the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other relevant trade agreements.

**Request for Proposal**:
The successful bidder will provide Inspection and maintenance of generator sets services as per the requirements outlined in the solicitation document. 

**Key Requirements**:
- Generator set inspection and maintenance services
- Regions of Delivery: Mont-Joli

**Notice Details**:
- Base Location: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
- Contact: Pichette, Veronique Hae Ok,  veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17679469?extsite=MTc2Nzk0NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Note**: The tender is already expired. For any enquires, please contact the above-mentioned contact information.  ###  End of Item  ###
